OFFER_DETAILS.DEFAULT: Your SiriusXM service will automatically stop at the end of the stated trial subscription term unless you decide to subscribe. If you decide to continue service, the paid subscription plan you choose will automatically renew and you will be charged the rate in effect at that time according to your chosen payment method. Fees and taxes apply. Please see our Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-866-635-2349. By registering for a trial subscription, SiriusXM may contact you at the registration information provided with special offers from time to time. You may always change your contact preferences with us. All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. Available only on factory-installed satellite radios. Radios not eligible for trial include those with active or recently active SiriusXM subscriptions including trial subscriptions. Satellite and streaming lineups vary.

partnerText.NO_PARTNER: Your free SiriusXM trial is a perk from your recent Service appointment.
partnerText.WITH_PARTNER: Your free SiriusXM trial is a perk from your recent {{partnerName}} Service appointment.

OFFER_DETAILS.DEFAULT: Your SiriusXM service will automatically stop at the end of the stated trial subscription term unless you decide to subscribe. If you decide to continue service, the paid subscription plan you choose will automatically renew and you will be charged the rate in effect at that time according to your chosen payment method. Fees and taxes apply. Please see our Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy for complete terms and how to cancel, which includes calling us at 1-866-635-2349. By registering for a trial subscription, SiriusXM may contact you at the registration information provided with special offers from time to time. You may always change your contact preferences with us. All fees, content and features are subject to change. This offer cannot be combined with any other and may be modified or terminated at any time. One trial subscription per vehicle per owner. Available only on new pre-owned vehicle purchases with factory-installed satellite radios. Radios not eligible for trial include those that have already received a SiriusXM trial subscription with their vehicle purchase through a dealer or other SiriusXM promotional program. Satellite and streaming lineups vary.

partnerText.NO_PARTNER: Your free SiriusXM trial is a perk for buying your vehicle.
partnerText.WITH_PARTNER: Your free SiriusXM trial is a perk for buying your vehicle on {{partnerName}}.
